name: Monster Girl Party Dress Up (Pro) - Halloween Fashion Party Studio Salon Game For Kids
name_original: Monster Girl Party Dress Up (Pro) - Halloween Fashion Party Studio Salon Game For Kids
description:
Monster girls have green skins, sharp teeth, and they eat weird things! But they want to be pretty as well!
Can YOU help them?
All the monsters are thrilled for prom night at Monster High School, and they're lining up for makeovers at your beauty salon! These crazy zombie girls are blood thirsty people eaters, but even they want to feel beautiful for the big party! Their green skin and sharp teeth will be hard to work with, so they came to the best professional around: you! Give each zombie girl a beauty makeover to get her ready for the party by picking out a cute dress and fixing her makeup. All the monster boys will be shocked when they see the beautiful girls on prom night!

Product Features:
- Crazy zombie monster themed beauty salon game.
- Wild looking monster girls that need lots of help to get ready for the party.
- Dress in the perfect ballgowns for the big night!
- Fix their makeup to cover their blood-thirsty mouths!

How to Play:
- Use easy, interactive controls to play.
- Choose a zombie girl to help for prom night.
- Do her makeup and hair.
- Dress her in a cute party dress.

Do not forget to match their skin and hair colors!
DOWNLOAD NOW!
